EmailTemplate.description: Use this template to email leads that have already registered for Gartner
EmailTemplate.name: Gartner PCC 2013 - Already Registered
EmailTemplate.subject: A PGi gift awaits you at Gartner PCC
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
PGi, the Meetings Experts
{!Lead.FirstName},
Join PGi at this year’s Gartner PCC conference at the Manchester Grand Hyatt in San Diego, CA on April 29-May 1, 2013 as we discuss groundbreaking new communication and collaboration trends for enterprises. We will be hosting on-site iMeet and GlobalMeet demos in Booth 118. Be sure to stop by for a special gift as well, before the goodies are gone.
Looking forward to seeing you there!
{!User.FirstName} {!User.LastName}
{!User.Phone}
P.S. Click here to find out why 75% of the Fortune 100™ companies depend on PGi for their collaboration solutions: http://cdn1.hubspot.com/hub/147341/file-25125560.pdf?t=1364306539000
AWARDS & ACCOLADES
2012 Silver Edison Award Best New Product, iMeet
2012 Silver Stevie Award Most Innovative Tech Company of the Year
2011 Stevie Award People's Choice, iMeet
InformationWeek Top 250 Innovators of the Year
© Premiere Global Services, Inc. and/or its affiliates PGi 3280 Peachtree Road, NE, Suite 1000, Atlanta, GA 30305
If you prefer not to receive emails from PGi, you may unsubscribe: http://experts.pgi.com/email-opt-out
